繁體中文.page_title: 新手/進階 Road Bike Fit
繁體中文.step1: 先由新手量測基本資料
繁體中文.expander_advanced_instructions:
- 如需更精準配適，可由物理、Fitter協助量測以下進階欄位。
- 未填寫進階欄位時，系統會自動由「新手公式」計算；如填入，將改用「進階公式」。
繁體中文.sitbone_height_label: 坐骨到地高度 Sit Bone to Floor (cm)
繁體中文.hip_flex_label: 髖關節屈曲度 Hip Flexion ROM (°)
繁體中文.knee_angle_low_label: 膝蓋最低點彎曲角度 Knee Angle at Bottom (°)
繁體中文.sternal_label: 胸骨凹口高 Sternal Notch Height (cm)
繁體中文.select_frame_label: 熱門車架篩選 (或選「自訂」)
繁體中文.stack_result_high: 你的車架 Stack ({input} mm) 過高，建議找 Stack ≈ {suggested} mm 的車架。
繁體中文.stack_result_ok: 建議 Stack：{suggested} mm／Δ = +{delta} mm → 可使用墊圈 {spacer} cm。
繁體中文.stack_result_adv: 進階公式建議 Stack：{suggested_adv} mm／與車架 Δ = +{delta_adv} mm → 可用墊圈 {spacer_adv} cm。
繁體中文.reach_result_too_long: 你的車架 Reach ({input} mm) 過長，建議找 Reach ≈ {suggested} mm 的車架。
繁體中文.reach_result_too_short: 你的車架 Reach ({input} mm) 過短，建議找 Reach ≈ {suggested} mm 的車架。
繁體中文.reach_result_ok: 建議 Reach：{suggested} mm／Δ = {delta} mm → 可透過更換龍頭 ±{delta} mm 調整。
繁體中文.reach_result_adv: 進階公式建議 Reach：{suggested_adv} mm／與車架 Δ = {delta_adv} mm → 可透過更換龍頭 ±{delta_adv} mm 調整。
繁體中文.shoulder_result:
建議把手寬度：{value} cm ± 2 cm
常見尺寸：38 / 40 / 42 / 44 cm。
繁體中文.crank_result: 曲柄長度參考：{value} mm（依性別與身高）。
繁體中文.crank_result_adv: 進階公式曲柄長度：{value_adv} mm（依大腿/小腿分段計算）。
繁體中文.health_tip1: - 若腰部或髖關節僵硬，建議在建議 Stack 上再墊 +0.5 cm，減少腰部受力。
繁體中文.health_tip2: - 若頸椎活動度有限，Reach 建議再短 10 mm 或把龍頭墊高 5 mm。
繁體中文.health_tip3: - 如果胸骨凹口高與坐骨高度差過大，建議把手 Drop 不超過 60 cm，避免腰背過度伸展。
繁體中文.health_tip4: - 如有身體傷痛或骨盆側傾、膝傷史，請先找物理治療師協助檢測，不要自行大幅調整。

English.expander_advanced_instructions:
- For more accurate fitting, a fitter/PT can help measure these advanced fields.
- If you do not fill them, the system will use the “Beginner formulas”. If you fill them, the “Advanced formulas” are applied.
English.stack_result_high: Your frame’s Stack ({input} mm) is too high. Recommended ≈ {suggested} mm.
English.stack_result_ok: Recommended Stack：{suggested} mm／Δ = +{delta} mm → add spacer {spacer} cm.
English.stack_result_adv: Advanced formula recommended Stack：{suggested_adv} mm／Δ = +{delta_adv} mm → spacer {spacer_adv} cm.
English.reach_result_too_long: Your frame’s Reach ({input} mm) is too long. Recommended ≈ {suggested} mm.
English.reach_result_too_short: Your frame’s Reach ({input} mm) is too short. Recommended ≈ {suggested} mm.
English.reach_result_ok: Recommended Reach：{suggested} mm／Δ = {delta} mm → adjust stem by ±{delta} mm.
English.reach_result_adv: Advanced formula recommended Reach：{suggested_adv} mm／Δ = {delta_adv} mm → adjust stem by ±{delta_adv} mm.
English.shoulder_result:
Recommended handlebar width：{value} cm ± 2 cm
Common sizes：38 / 40 / 42 / 44 cm.
English.crank_result: Crank length reference：{value} mm (by gender & height).
English.crank_result_adv: Advanced formula crank length：{value_adv} mm (by thigh/leg segments).
English.health_tip1: - If your hip or lower back is stiff, add +0.5 cm to recommended Stack to reduce stress.
English.health_tip2: - If limited neck mobility, reduce Reach by 10 mm or raise stem by 5 mm.
English.health_tip3: - If sternal notch height minus sit bone height is too large, keep handlebar drop under 60 cm to avoid low back strain.
English.health_tip4: - If you have injury history or pelvic tilt, consult a physical therapist before major adjustments.
